Try before you buy.

Try IQOS now for 30 days free of charge at home*
or experience it in your IQOS store.

text_1652985107.text: * Offer incl. 3 trial packs of HEETS is only valid for new customers.

text_2010432185.text: * Offer incl. 3 trial packs of HEETS is only valid for new customers.

text.text:
HEETS Turquoise Selection

Enjoy real tobacco with a delicate menthol aroma.

The new home of Services & Privileges

With myIQOS you'll find support as you take the next step on your journey with IQOS.

95% fewer harmful chemicals.

Compared to cigarettes.*
Because the tobacco is heated and not burned.

text_1559161425.text: *Average reduction in the levels of a range of harmful chemicals from IQOS (9 so-called “priority toxicants” identified by the WHO) compared to the smoke from a reference cigarette (3R4F). Based on Health Canada's Intense Smoking Regime without nicotine.

text.text:
Our best heated tobacco device

IQOS 3 DUO for €49.

14,7 million* adult smokers have already switched to IQOS, the smoke-free alternative to cigarettes. 

* PMI Financials or estimates, IQOS user panels and PMI Market Research. Status as of July 2021. IQOS users who have completely quit cigarettes and for whom HEETS sticks represent at least 70% of their past 7-day heated tobacco consumption.

HEETS made for IQOS

IQOS and HEETS are the perfect combination to enjoy the real taste of tobacco.​

Free delivery

Delivery is free and only takes 
1-3 workdays.

Free return shipping

Returns are always free of shipping costs for you.

Personal support

Our IQOS experts are always there for you.
